description: Main entry point for a Flutter app managing user authentication and navigation between attendance and reports screens, using providers for state management.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget that provides theme and global state management, setting up providers and MaterialApp.

classes.name: RootSwitcher
classes.description: Decides initial screen based on authentication state.

classes.name: HomeShell
classes.description: Main scaffold with navigation between attendance and reports screens, and user greeting.

classes.name: _HomeShellState
classes.description: State class managing navigation index and page list.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Initializes Flutter binding, loads environment variables, and runs the app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds widget tree for each class, constructing UI based on authentication state and navigation logic.
